title: Apocalypse.Now.1979.Redux.Full.Disclosure.Edition.1080p.AC3.5.1.
description:
Description
Francis Ford Coppola personally supervised the transfer of Apocalypse Now to Blu-ray, and it shows in every breathtaking frame. This IS the Redux version. (longer runtime)
Note: English subs ARE embedded in the file,but the time-code is off,rather than take the time to re-encode I added an additional english sub file with the timecodes changed.
Audio section was taken directly from the DTS-HD file on the bluray and re-encoded to AC3,5.1,640Kb/s (to save space)
The entire reason for this encode was to keep it under 4Gb for those,like myself,transferring files via FAT32. ENJOY!

Format : Matroska
File size : 3.47 GB (Feature only)
Duration : 03:16:10
    Video
Codec ID : V_MPEG4/ISO/AVC
Width : 1920
Height : 816
Display aspect ratio : 2.35:1
Frame rate mode : Variable
Frame rate : 29.976 fps
Video Bitrate : 1890 Kb/s
Bitstream type : MPEG-4 Part 10
    Audio
Format : AC3
Codec ID : A_AC3
Bit rate mode : Constant
Channel(s) : 6 (5.1)
Channel positions : FR,C,FL,RR,RL,LFE
Sampling rate : 48KHz
Audio Bitrate : 640 Kb/s

Profile : High@L5
